title: Placebo effect can alter your experience of games, scientists say
text:
Placebo effect can alter your experience of games, scientists say 
Published By: Eurogamer.net - Today 
The placebo effect can make games seem more interesting or adaptive to the way you play, a new UK study suggests.The medically-recognised ph...
